STARDRAKE OF GRAVITIC COILS: 2 Level 10 monsters\ Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster with 3000 or more ATK, and it has the highest ATK on the field, you can Xyz Summon "Stardrake of Gravitic Coils" by using 1 monster you control with the lowest ATK or DEF (your choice, if tied) as material. Cannot be used as Xyz or Link Material. While this Xyz Summoned card is on the field, your opponent cannot target monsters for attacks, except this one. If this card battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation only, this card’s ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the opponent's battling monster +100.
REACTOR SHOCKER: Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation. When your opponent activates an effect, and you have an effect in the same Chain: You can negate the activated effects of all cards with a lower Chain Link number than this card then, if the number of your effects in this Chain is equal to or greater than your opponent’s, draw cards equal to that number then if one of your effects in the Chain is Chain Link 1, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Reactor Shocker" once per turn.
BRUNHILDE, THE IRON BLOOD VANGUARD: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can place 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your hand or Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap, except "Brünhilde, Iron Blood Vanguard", and if you do, this card's Level becomes 8. You can target 1 "Iron Blood" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it. During your opponent's turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s), while this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Brünhilde, Iron Blood Vanguard" once per turn.
PRINZ RUPPRECHT, IRON BLOOD LINDWURM: While you control a Level 8 monster or an "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap, this card's Level becomes 8. You can only use each of the following effects of "Prinz Rupprecht, Iron Blood Lindwurm" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your hand. During your opponent's turn, if your opponent controls a monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, while this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card, then you can, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Iron Blood" Xyz Monster using monsters you control.
REGENSBURG, IRON BLOOD DRAGON: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only use each of the following effects of "Regensburg, Iron Blood Dragon" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your Deck, except "Regensburg, Iron Blood Dragon", also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a face-up card(s) you control, while this card is a Continuous Trap and you control a Rank 8 monster: You can negate that effect.
HINDENBURG, IRON BLOOD DOOMBRINGER: If you control an "Iron Blood" card: You can either Special Summon this card from your hand or place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap. You can target 1 card your opponent controls; send 1 "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control to the GY, and if you do, destroy that target. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect, while this card is a Continuous Trap and you control a Rank 8 monster: You can negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Hindenburg, Iron Blood Doombringer" once per turn.
AGIR, IRON BLOOD UNDERTAKER: You can send 1 other card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap, then add 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Agir, Iron Blood Undertaker". You can target 1 other monster you control with a Level; its Level becomes 8. When your opponent activates a monster effect, while this card is a Continuous Trap and you control a Rank 8 monster: You can negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Agir, Iron Blood Undertaker" once per turn.
IRON BLOOD BLITZKRIEG: Each time you activate the effect of an "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control or if a card your opponent controls is destroyed by the effect of an "Iron Blood" card you control, inflict 300 damage to your opponent immediately after it resolves. You can send 1 other card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; take 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your Deck and either add it to your hand or place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap. You can only use this effect of "Iron Blood Blitzkrieg" once per turn.
IRON BLOOD RESPITE: You can target 1 "Iron Blood" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone or GY; add it to your hand. If an "Iron Blood" monster is sent to the GY or is banished by an opponent’s card: You can target 1 "Iron Blood" monster in your GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Iron Blood Respite" once per turn.
BISMARCK, IRON BLOOD COMMANDER: 2 Level 8 monsters\nFor this card's Xyz Summon, you can treat "Iron Blood" Continuous Traps you control as Level 8 monsters for material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Bismarck, Iron Blood Commander" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can detach any number of materials from this card, and if you do, add "Iron Blood" cards with different names from your Deck to your hand, up to the number of materials detached. If an "Iron Blood" Monster Card(s) you control leaves the field by an opponent’s card, while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 "Iron Blood" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone or GY; Special Summon it.
ULRICH VON HUTTEN, IRON BLOOD DAEMON: ULRICH VON HUTTEN, IRON BLOOD DAEMON

2 Level 8 monsters\nFor each "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control, monsters you control gain 100 ATK and monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ulrich von Hutten, Iron Blood Daemon" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls until the end of this turn. You can target 1 non-Xyz "Iron Blood" monster in your GY or banishment; detach 1 material from this card, and if you do, either Special Summon it or place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap.
FRITZ RUMEY, IRON BLOOD JUGGERNAUT: 3+ Level 8 "Iron Blood" monsters\nYou can only control 1 "Fritz Rumey, Iron Blood Juggernaut". Face-up Spell/Traps you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent’s card effects. If the effect of an "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control is activated: You can target 1 other card card on the field; destroy it. Once per turn, during your Main Phase or your opponent's Standby Phase: You can detach any number of materials from this card, and if you do, place "Iron Blood" monsters with different names from your hand, Deck, or GY in your Spell & Trap Zones as face-up Continuous Traps, up to the number of materials detached.
THE CONDESCENDER: (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY then target 1 face-up monster on the field; declare a number from 1 to 3 then reduce that monster's Level, Rank, or Link Rating by the declared number until the end of the next turn. If a monster whose Level, Rank, or Link Rating is lower than its original value is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your GY but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 effect of "The Condescender" per turn and only once that turn.
STAINED BIRD BRIA: If this card is in your hand: You can discard 1 card; shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to your hand, then, if your opponent controls more cards than you, draw 1 card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card in either GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, or if it is a "Stain" card, add it to the hand instead, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Bird Bria" once per turn.
STAINED DEER DANTE: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. If this card is in your GY: You can show 1 "Stain" card from your field or face-up in your opponent's Deck, and if you do, shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Deer Dante" once per turn.
STAINED FOX FENESS: If your opponent controls more cards than you: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 other face-up card on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can send 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your Deck to the GY; Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Fox Feness" once per turn.
STAINED RAPTOR ROLLO: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Stain" monster in your GY or 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to your field, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. When an attack is declared involving this card and an opponent's monster: You can shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also after that, place that opponent's monster on top of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Raptor Rollo" once per turn.
STAINED SOLITAIRE: You can reveal 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck; shuffle 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle 1 "Stain" monster you control that mentions "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck, GY, or banishment to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Solitaire" once per turn.
STARGAZER OF THE STAINED: If a card(s) leaves your opponent's Deck, except during the Draw Phase: You can Tribute this card from your hand or field; add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent controls a card: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Stain" monster that mentions "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" from face-up in your opponent's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stargazer of the Stained" once per turn.
STAINED SCIONESS SILIA: During your Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using "Stain" monsters that mention "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" from your hand or field as material. If this card is sent to the GY: You can discard 1 card and send 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to the GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Scioness Silia" once per turn.
STAINED SILHOUETTE:
If a card(s) leaves your opponent's Deck, except during the Draw Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, but shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck when it leaves the field. If your opponent controls a card (Quick Effect): You can reveal 1 "Stain" card in your hand, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your Deck or GY.
● Until the End Phase, this card's name becomes the original name of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and it gains that monster's original effects.
You can only use each effect of "Stained Silhouette" once per turn.
STAINED SOVEREIGN SILAS: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add to your hand or Set 1 "Stain" card from your Deck. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; while it is face-up on the field, neither player can activate its effects. If your opponent activates a card or effect, and this card is in your GY: You can shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Stained Sovereign Silas" once per turn.
